description.value:
You are able to upgrade your servitor to better suit your particular needs. Choose one of the following options:

Steel Defender. Your servitor always treats a save ends effect as an EoT effect and their characteristic scores increase by 1 for the purpose of resisting potencies. It has an edge on Intuition tests.

Hunter-Seeker. Your servitor gains a bonus to its speed and a bonus to the number of squares it can shift when it takes the Disengage move action equal to your Reason score. It gains a +2 bonus to its free strikes and its rolled damage bonus. It has an edge on Agility tests.

War Frame. Your servitor replaces its current role with the mount role. Its size and stability increase by 1, with any size 1 target becoming size 2. While mounted on your servitor, abilities that target you have a double bane, and whenever you use your Infusion ability, your servitor can spend a recovery. It has an edge on Might tests.

When you take a respite activity to change your upgrade you can change the selective function feature for your servitor.
